item.description:
Margaret had to cancel due to a road trip she needs to take, so take the long drive to Ashford for the night of fun and games!!! I do have games, but bring others if you want, and be prepared for some ping pong as well! Anyone wanting to play chess for a change, I have several chess games too. As usual, bring snacks and byob. Hope to see you all here! Note: GPS may take you through back roads, but if you're coming down route 84, take the route 74 exit and your gps won"t take you down any dirt roads... :-)

When you see the mailbox on moon road, turn on to the street right there, and it's the first house on the right... big cedar home...

Weather permitting, we may have an outdoor fire pit going too!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Maragaritaville at Marion's instead!!!
